job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support, rather than developing new AI models or building AI-powered applications from scratch. The core tasks involve analyzing tickets, providing feedback to AI, and integrating human expertise with AI, which aligns more with the use of AI tools for productivity enhancement rather than a specialized AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies' involves developing and evaluating new approaches, which can be considered a form of software development or engineering in the context of AI integration.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve' highlights the need to understand business needs (customer support) and align technical solutions (AI integration) to meet those needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving the AI system' implies making changes or enhancements to the AI's performance, which is related to the modeling aspect of AI.

The phrase 'Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback' is a form of data annotation or feedback loop crucial for improving AI models, fitting within the broader scope of modeling and training.
job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
